participant_1.background:
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
my favorite band is one direction.
when i retire i want to open a bakery.
I went to a music festival and expressed myself through dancing and singing.
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.

participant_2.background:
I stayed in and ordered a pizza, even though I had promised myself I would eat healthier.
i am almost 7 feet tall.
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
I'm passionate about writing because it allows me to express my thoughts and feelings in a way that I can't otherwise.
i wish i had money to travel.

content.text: Hello!  I'm looking forward to learning more about you!
Hello!  It's nice to meet you! I'm excited to learn more about you, too!
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.
That's so cool!  I've always wanted to go to Comic Con, but I've never been able to make it.  What's your favorite thing about Comic Con?

I love being able to meet people who are just as passionate about comics and pop culture as I am.  I also love the cosplay.  It's so much fun to see people come up with their own creative interpretations of characters from their favorite movies, TV shows, and comics.
That sounds amazing!  I'm sure it's a great experience.  I'm not much of a cosplayer, but I love seeing what other people come up with.  It's always so creative.
Yeah, it's definitely a unique experience.  I'm glad you're planning on going one day!
Thanks!  I'm really looking forward to it.  What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is One Direction.  I love their music and their style.  They're such a talented group of guys.
Oh, cool!  I've heard good things about them, but I've never listened to their music.  I'll have to check them out sometime.
You definitely should!  I think you'll like them.  What do you like to do for fun?
I love to write.  It's a great way for me to express my thoughts and feelings.  I also enjoy reading, watching movies, and spending time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great hobbies!  I love to read, too.  I'm currently reading a book about the history of comic books.
Oh, that sounds interesting!  I've never read a book about comic books before.  I might have to check that out.
You definitely should!  It's really interesting.
